categories: Category:Sith acolytes and apprentices of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Fannatex was a Human male who was the apprentice of Mahish, a Sith Lord of the Sith Empire during the Cold War. Mahish brought Fannatex with him to Alderaan when he was hunting the Jedi Master Fellil, but Fannatex was forced to recruit outside help when Mahish was killed by Advozse mercenaries.
